entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 in the afternoon except 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h except 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
